        }

        /* Section headers styling */
        .section-title h2 {

          padding-bottom: 0 !important;

        }

        /* Ensure landing styles take precedence */

        /* Fix community card layout */
        .community-grid {

        }
        
        /* Remove extra paragraph spacing */
        p:empty {

        }
        
        /* Fix hero visual spacing */
        .hero-visual img {
          max-width: 100%;
          height: auto;
        }
        
        /* Hide image captions in hero */

        }

        }

          color: var(--color-text-secondary) !important;
          margin: 0 !important;
        }
        
        .community-card-body {

        }
        
        .community-stats {
          display: flex !important;

          flex: 1 !important;

        }
        
        .community-stat {
          display: flex !important;
          justify-content: space-between !important;
          align-items: center !important;
        }
        
        .community-features {
          display: flex !important;
          flex-direction: column !important;
          gap: var(--spacing-sm) !important;
          margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg) !important;
          flex: 1 !important;
          min-height: 120px !important;
        }
        
        .community-feature {
          display: flex !important;
          align-items: center !important;
          gap: var(--spacing-sm) !important;
          font-size: var(--font-size-sm) !important;
          color: var(--color-text-secondary) !important;
        }
        
        .stat-icon {
          width: 1rem !important;
          height: 1rem !important;
          color: #EAB308 !important;
          margin-right: 0.25rem !important;
          display: inline-block !important;
          vertical-align: text-bottom !important;
        }
        
        .community-stats-bar {
          background: linear-gradient(to right, var(--color-primary), #2563EB) !important;
          border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg) !important;
          padding: var(--spacing-xl) !important;
          display: grid !important;
          grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr) !important;
          gap: var(--spacing-xl) !important;
          text-align: center !important;
          color: white !important;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
          .community-stats-bar {
            grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr) !important;
          }
        }
        
        .stats-bar-item {
          color: white !important;
          text-decoration: none !important;
          transition: var(--transition) !important;
          display: flex !important;
          flex-direction: column !important;
          align-items: center !important;
          gap: 0.25rem !important;
        }
        
        .stats-bar-item:hover {
          transform: scale(1.05) !important;
        }
        
        .stats-bar-value {
          font-size: var(--font-size-3xl) !important;
          font-weight: 700 !important;
          margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs) !important;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
          .stats-bar-value {
            font-size: var(--font-size-4xl) !important;
          }
        }
        
        .stats-bar-label {
          font-size: var(--font-size-sm) !important;
          opacity: 0.9 !important;
        }

        .quickstart-number p {

        @media (min-width: 768px) {
